alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 15 at 4:45PM PDT until March 15 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MST/545 PM PDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 445 PM MST /445 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated another thunderstorm moving into the Laughlin area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bullhead City, Laughlin, Katherine Landing and Big Bend Rec Area. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
